stages.name: Ordinary World
stages.description: Early childhood, establishing foundational experiences and beliefs.

stages.name: Call to Adventure
stages.description: Late childhood/early adolescence, encountering challenges or opportunities that disrupt the ordinary world.

stages.name: Refusal of the Call
stages.description: Mid-adolescence, initial resistance to the call, possibly due to fear or uncertainty.

stages.name: Meeting the Mentor
stages.description: Late adolescence/early adulthood, seeking guidance and support from a mentor or role model.

stages.name: Crossing the Threshold
stages.description: Early adulthood, committing to the journey, leaving the familiar behind.

stages.name: Tests, Allies, Enemies
stages.description: Mid-adulthood, facing challenges, forming alliances, and encountering adversaries.

stages.name: Approach to the Inmost Cave
stages.description: Late adulthood, confronting inner fears and doubts, preparing for the ultimate challenge.

stages.name: Ordeal
stages.description: Mid-life crisis, undergoing a transformative experience, often involving overcoming a significant obstacle.

stages.name: Reward
stages.description: Early middle age, reaping the benefits of the journey, achieving personal growth and fulfillment.

stages.name: The Road Back
stages.description: Mid-middle age, facing new challenges or responsibilities that may require returning to the ordinary world.

stages.name: Resurrection
stages.description: Late middle age, overcoming final obstacles, emerging stronger and wiser.

stages.name: Return with the Elixir
stages.description: Retirement, sharing wisdom and experiences with others, contributing to the betterment of society.
